page.title: 09CHERRY BURTON-8
page.content: {Cherry Burton Census Parish Profiles ____________________________________ POPULATION: 1345 9% are pensioners and 6% under school age. HOUSEHOLDS & AMENITIES There are 435 households in the Parish of which 89% are owner-occupied. 5% are rented from the Council. 7% of households don't own a car,but 44% have two cars. 4 households (1%) lack a bath or inside toilet or both. ECONOMIC FEATURES 7% of working the population are unemployed,(males5%) unemployment among young adults 12%. Around 67%of working residents worked in services,29% in manufacturing and construction. 75% of people travel to work by car and 15% walk......:51% of married women are economically active.
